message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $8,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering $10,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $15,000.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway from your original offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from my original offer, which was $9,000. Can you consider $9,500?

I understand your compromise, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous counteroffer, which was $10,500. I'm counteroffering $10,750. This is my best offer, and I'm willing to stand firm at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $9,800. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you've made one last offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,800. I'm willing to make one last counteroffer, and that's $11,000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to stand firm at this price.

I'm disappointed that we couldn't come to an agreement at a lower price, Alice. However, I'm willing to make one more attempt. I'm willing to pay $10,200, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please reconsider.

I understand that you're willing to make one more attempt, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,200. I'm willing to make a small concession, and I'm counteroffering $10,800. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to stand firm at this price.
I'm sorry, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to pay $10,800. I'm going to have to walk away from this deal. I'll consider buying the product from John for $8,000 instead.
